communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Mississippi Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All public records pertaining to Hunter Elward, Brett McAlpin and Christian Dedmon from date of hire until the date this request is processed including but not limited to personnel records, resumes, salary documentation, internal investigation records, disciplinary records, use of force reports, and allegations and sustained complaints. 

All civilian complaints submitted against Hunter Elward, Brett McAlpin and Christian Dedmon from date of hire until the date this request is processed

All complaints, substantiated and unsubstantiated, pertaining to any use of force employed by Hunter Elward, Brett McAlpin and Christian Dedmon from date of hire until the date this request is processed

All email correspondence and internal memoranda sent or received by Sheriff Bryan Bailey that contain the following keywords: “Hunter Elward” “Brett McAlpin” “Christian Dedmon” “Michael Corey Jenkins” “Eddie Terrell Parker” and “Trent Walker.” Please limit your search to January 24 2023 until the date this request is processed

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 7 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Hannah Beckler

title: Veronica Cisneros (Southern Nevada Counter-Terrorism Center and Office of Attorney General) (Southern Nevada Counter-Terrorism Center)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Nevada Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All threat assessments, field reports, intelligence updates, emails, and email attachments, which mention the following names:

"Veronica Carolina Cisneros Pahl"
"Veronica C Cisneros Pahl"
"Veronica C Cisneros"

a Mexican national and current legal resident immigrant with birth date of 01/19/1976

This request has a date range of 01/01/2015 until the date this request is processed.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Veronica Cisneros

communications.subject: Vermont Public Records Act Request: David Sellers (University of Vermont)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Vermont Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:

Any police reports, any 911 calls, any transcripts, videos, interrogations, any arrest records, deal memos, pleas, claims of sexual assault, reports of sexual assault, any court records, hearing records or transcripts, any case files, court case files, divorce records, divorce transcripts, divorce filings, any exhibits, photos, evidence about or in prosecution of David Sellers, Dave Sellers, David E. Sellers, David Edward Sellers of Vermont -- Warren, VT -- previously of 481 Prickly Mtn Road, Warren, VT DOB: 9/7/1938. Any any all records, papers, documents, please. Dates ranging from 1970 to 1990.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 3 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

samantha wender

communications.subject: RE: Vermont Public Records Act Request: David Sellers (University of Vermont)
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

I wanted to follow up on the following Vermont Public Records Act request, copied below, and originally submitted on June 27, 2023. Please let me know when I can expect to receive a response.

Thanks for your help, and let me know if further clarification is needed.

communications.subject: RE:[PRA 20230627 Wender]  Vermont Public Records Act Request: David Sellers (University of Vermont)
communications.communication:
Dear Samantha,

I am writing to acknowledge receipt of your records request. Your original request was received Tuesday, June 27, 2023 and a search was initiated immediately. I have no record of a request dated June 24, 2023 (see attached original message). Additionally, please note that requests received outside of business hours (e.g., Saturday) are processed the next business day.

We are conducting a search to determine what records, if any, are responsive to the request and their status under Vermont law. Please find more information about the University’s Records and Documents Requests Policy at https://www.uvm.edu/sites/default/files/UVM-Policies/policies/records_request.pdf and on the Vermont Legislature’s website here: https://legislature.vermont.gov/statutes/section/01/005/00318.

I understand from the Office of Record that some or all records in the 1970 to 1990 range you request will require the recall of physical records from offsite storage and significant time to review individual files. I estimate that there will be significant time associated with reviewing the records for the information you seek. I will provide you an estimate once our initial search is complete.

Below is a link to the University of Vermont Operating Procedure related to costs associated with records requests. If you wish to revise your original request to potentially reduce costs, you would then be welcome to submit follow up requests. Please let me know if you have any questions; my direct contact information is below.

https://www.uvm.edu/sites/default/files/UVM-Policies/policies/cost_assessment.pdf

Sincerely,

Maureen
Maureen Jennings
Records Custodian & Compliance Coordinator
Office of Compliance and Privacy Services
University of Vermont
P: 802.656.3415<tel:802.656.3086> (direct) / E: public.records@uvm.edu<mailto:public.records@uvm.edu>

PUBLIC RECORDS REQUESTS INFORMATION<https://www.uvm.edu/compliance/public-records>
Office of Compliance & Privacy Services<https://www.uvm.edu/compliance>     •     Feedback, Comments, Questions<mailto:compliance@uvm.edu?subject=Feedback,%20Comments,%20Questions>

********************CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE********************
This e-mail and any attachments may contain private, confidential, and privileged information for the sole use of the intended recipient.  This information is intended for the recipient and use by authorized addressees only.  If you are not the intended recipient, please notify the sender immediately.  Any dissemination, distribution, forwarding, printing, copying or otherwise duplicating is strictly prohibited and could violate federal and/or state law.

UVM is subject to the Vermont Public Records Act and communications to and from this email address, including attachments, are subject to disclosure unless exempted under the Act or otherwise applicable law.
